dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly express their feelings, without fear of judgment or reprisal.
Your FarTwin will maintain a reserved demeanor, only revealing their emotions to those they trust.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront the opposing party directly, using assertive language and tone.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground with the opposing party, working together to find a mutually beneficial solution.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on high-risk challenges, viewing them as opportunities for growth and adventure.
Your FarTwin will approach risk with caution, carefully weighing the potential benefits against the potential drawbacks before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on their intuition, trusting their gut feelings and instincts to guide their decision-making.
Your FarTwin will approach decisions with a logical and analytical mindset, carefully considering multiple perspectives and data points before making a choice.

dimensions.label: Social Comfort Level
dimensions.description: How comfortable is your FarTwin in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will thrive in social environments, effortlessly navigating complex networks and building meaningful relationships.
Your FarTwin will prefer to spend time alone or in small groups, recharging their energy and avoiding overwhelming stimuli.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin learn best?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn through practical experience, preferring to apply theoretical knowledge in real-world settings.
Your FarTwin will excel at abstract concepts and theoretical frameworks, requiring comprehensive reading materials and intellectual stimulation.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into manageable parts, using systematic analysis and critical thinking to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will approach problems with a creative mindset, generating innovative solutions through intuition and out-of-the-box thinking.

dimensions.label: Work-Life Balance
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin manage work and personal responsibilities?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize professional success above all else, often sacrificing personal time for the sake of career advancement.
Your FarTwin will strive to maintain a healthy balance between work and personal life, prioritizing self-care and leisure activities.
